The purrr package:

  * On CRAN: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/purrr/index.html>
  * Development on GitHub: <https://github.com/hadley/purrr> 
  * Coverage in [R for Data Science](http://r4ds.had.co.nz)
    - [Iteration](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/iteration.html)
    - [Handling hierarchy](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/hierarchy.html)

Materials created to support:

  * [2016-08-12 meeting](https://github.com/minisciencegirl/studyGroup/issues/131) of the Vancouver R Study Group.  
  * [STAT 545](http://stat545.com) Exploratory Data Analysis
  * [DSCI 523](http://www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/courses.cfm?page=code&code=DSCI) Data Wrangling, part of the UBC Master of Data Science
